dcterms:creator: Roberto Xavier
Kleber Padovani de Souza
Annie Chateau
Ronnie Alves
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10 reads with 8 base pairs each, derived from a 25bp microgenome of Escherichia coli, used in the seminal approach for genome assembly.
dcterms:title: 10 reads with 8bp from the seminal approach

dcterms:creator: Roberto Xavier
Kleber Padovani de Souza
Annie Chateau
Ronnie Alves
dcterms:description: A collection of 17 new datasets generated from microgenomes, each containing 10, 20, or 30 reads of varying lengths (8bp, 10bp, or 15bp), derived from a 25bp and a 50bp microgenome of Escherichia coli.
dcterms:title: 17 new datasets generated from microgenomes

dcterms:creator: Roberto Xavier
Kleber Padovani de Souza
Annie Chateau
Ronnie Alves
dcterms:description: A set of 5 novel datasets derived from other microgenomes, representing larger fragments of previously annotated genes from Escherichia coli.
dcterms:title: 5 novel datasets derived from other microgenomes

dcterms:creator: Roberto Xavier
Kleber Padovani de Souza
Annie Chateau
Ronnie Alves
dcterms:description: A total of 23 datasets used in the experiments, including the seminal dataset and the newly generated datasets, aimed at evaluating the performance of various genome assembly approaches.
dcterms:title: 23 datasets used in the experiments
